article.headline: Saint Louis 69, Fordham 65
article.story: ST. LOUIS (AP) -- Kevin Lisch scored 16 of his team-high 22 points after halftime as Saint Louis downed Fordham 69-65 in overtime Wednesday night in an Atlantic-10 Conference matchup. Tommie Liddell III added a double-double for Saint Louis with 18 points and 11 rebounds. The Billikens (15-11, 6-6) trailed by 10 early in the second half before using an 11-1 run to get back into the game, winning for the third time in four games. The Rams (10-13, 4-7) got a season-high 30 points and 13 rebounds from Bryant Dunston, and Mike Moore added 11 points for the Rams. With the Rams leading 37-30, Saint Louis used a 7-0 run on baskets by Luke Meyer, a 3-pointer by Lisch and a game-tying lay-up from Liddell to tie the game 37-37. Neither team would lead by more than five points the rest of the way. The Billikens led 55-50 late when Fordham went to Dunston, who scores seven points in a row for his team, including a three-point play with 21.9 seconds left in regulation to pull the Rams within one at 57-56. After Lisch knocked down a pair of free throws, Marcus Stout, who had 10 points in the game, hit a game-tying 3-pointer with 4.3 seconds left to send the game into overtime tied 59-all. The Billikens trailed 63-62 when Barry Eberhardt's 3-pointer with 1:26 to play in overtime gave Saint Louis the lead for good.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
